text: Spiritual Machines is the fourth studio album by Canadian rock band Our Lady Peace. It was released on December 12, 2000. The producers of the album was Arnold Lanni and lead singer Raine Maida and it was the last Our Lady Peace album produced by long time producer Arnold Lanni. It is certified double platinum in Canada, peaking #5. == Singles from Spiritual Machines == *2000 - "In Repair" *2000 - "Life" *2001 - "Right Behind You (Mafia)" ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Our Lady Peace albums
title: Spiritual Machines
